dutchparl 0.0.0.9007
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

addCabinetInfo()

Add information on cabinet composition and elections to metadata. This data is obtained from ParlGov (http://www.parlgov.org/).

addInfo()

Add information on cabinets, elections and parties to dataset. This data is obtained from ParlGov (http://www.parlgov.org/).

addPartyInfo()

Add information on party characteristics to voteList or questionerList object. This data is obtained from ParlGov (http://www.parlgov.org/).

as.rollcall()

Transform into rollcall object

cosponsors()

Calculate cosponsorship between MPs

downloadQuestions()

Download Dutch Parliamentary Behaviour Questions Dataset from the internet

downloadVotes()

Download Dutch Parliamentary Behaviour Vote Dataset from the internet

examplequestions

Dutch Parliamentary Behaviour Dataset (Questions)

examplevotes

Dutch Parliamentary Behaviour Dataset (Votes)

randomvotes()

Select a random number of votes from a voteList object

rice()

Calculate rice score

subset(<questionList>)

Subset questionList object

subset(<voteList>)

Subset voteList object

votesame()

Calculate the percentate of votes in which parties voted the same
